function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Historical average energy use decrease due to lockdown measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High energy use in buildings, impacting the environment and resources","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible waste patterns in energy use during diminished occupancy","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of occupant presence and actions on total energy use in buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in energy consumption in health centers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in energy consumption in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Zero energy consumption in some buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced occupancy in buildings during lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous operation of data processing rooms with servers and racks in administrative building","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Equipment left in stand-by mode","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous operation of equipment such as refrigerators and stand-by plug loads in elementary and nursery schools","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty and variations in energy consumption may not be considered in the EUI estimation model, leading to discrepancies between estimated and actual values.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unnecessary stand-by plug loads, such as computers, contributing to high energy consumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Empty refrigerators contributing to high energy consumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unoccupied building leading to higher energy demand than necessary","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 due to climate conditions","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dissemination of covid-19 in built and social environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disregard of climate change by building stakeholders","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher ventilation rates in buildings due to covid-19 increase energy use","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Abnormal energy use intensity BEUI in municipal buildings during lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in energy performance of buildings based on cultural and social aspects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the return of activities leading to systems being left turned on in buildings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Organizational culture contributing to baseline energy consumption during unoccupied periods.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residual energy consumption due to community use of the building during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for disease spread through community use of the building","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residual energy consumption in net-positive buildings during lockdown periods","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced building occupancy during severe crisis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Return of occupants to workplaces after severe crisis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resilience against future shocks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential increase in energy consumption due to remote work policies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in energy usage trends in the residential sector","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rebound effects from energy efficiency measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented lockdown leading to energy wastage in municipal buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data validity and generalizability in post-pandemic world","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High energy consumption in municipality buildings during lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unnoticed remaining energy consumption in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of energy consumption with basal metabolic rate","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unoccupied buildings presenting considerable energy consumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Basal energy use due to inefficiency and organizational culture","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Basal energy use attributed to stand-by and vital loads","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Zoonotic transmission from live wild animal trade market","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International travel contributing to the spread of Covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of global spread due to air travel","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through aerosol acknowledged by WHO","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to virus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of social distancing measures may lead to increased transmission of Covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear transmission routes and factors for Covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
